title: Eddy's Mechanical Dopefish
content:
As you know, the Keen community and the Dopefish community can be a bit separated. There are many cool things at the Dopeforums never mentioned here. Anyways, I though this might be worth mentioning, someone has made a cool mechanical dopefish. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-dopekeen.gif[/img]

[url=http://www.angelfire.com/folk/teh_edfish/photos/]www.angelfire.com/folk/te...sh/photos/[/url]

[img]http://www.angelfire.com/folk/teh_edfish/photos/thumbnails/400x300/18.JPG[/img]Eat your veggies!

title: Re: Eddy's Mechanical Dopefish
content:
All your dopefish are belong to mechano.

Hehs, everytime I wonder if my Keen fixation is a narrow oddity, the Dopefish community reassures me.A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/lind.jpg[/img]

-Levellord
